welcomePage.immersive_audio_experience: Immerse yourself in an immersive audio experience with Sonk. Discover music in a way you never imagined.
welcomePage.artist_page_description: On Sonk, you'll be able to listen to complete albums from any artist, enjoying the best sound quality and a wide variety of Sonk's.
welcomePage.optimized_description: Thanks to Sonk's cross-device compatibility, you'll be able to enjoy your favorite music anywhere, on mobiles, smartwatches, tablets... Enjoy our desktop applications for Windows and Android.
welcomePage.team_description: Sonk has been developed by music lovers, get to know them.

pricing.title: Simple pricing, for everyone
pricing.description: Sonk is a free and OpenSource project, but maintaining it has a cost Help us!

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Sonk is free, you can enjoy the full experience with this plan

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Help us develop and maintain Sonk with this plan!
features: Everything included in the free tier
We've had over 100 cups of coffee during development... Want to invite us to one? ;)
You'll be helping with the maintenance and future development of the project!

loginLayout.experience: Discover an unmatched musical experience, enjoy and share your music like you have never done before.
